channel.title: err:"2006, “Connection Test Failed:Can’t connect to local MySQL server through socket
channel.description:
Installed redash on the windows through docker.
Tried to connected to Mysql running on docker in a separate docker network.
Unable to connect to Mysql. The notification error says.
err:"2006, “Connection Test Failed:Can’t connect to local MySQL server through socket ‘/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock’”.
Tried it with redash version 7 and 8. Both have same issue.

item.title: err:"2006, “Connection Test Failed:Can’t connect to local MySQL server through socket
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
This question isn’t specific to Redash. Sounds like a standard docker networking issue.

Have you configured port forwarding so that the two docker networks are accessible to one another?

Read full topic
item.source: err:"2006, “Connection Test Failed:Can’t connect to local MySQL server through socket
